titles: Die Veneris, 28 August. 1646. Ordered by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that Tuesday, being the eight day of September, now next coming, be set a part for a day of publike thanksgiving within the Cities of London and Westminster, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for John Wright, at the King Head in the Old Bayley,
notes: Title from heading and first lines of text.
An order of Parliament that 8 September be set apart as a day of public thanksgiving for Parliamentary successes.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Public worship --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
